title: WTB T206 Johnsons, Youngs, Lajoies, and Matty White Cap
author: t206kid

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Johnsons, Youngs, Lajoies, and Matty White Cap
posts.post_content: Looking to buy any T206 Walter Johnsons, Cy Youngs, Nap Lajoies, and looking for at least 1 low grade Matty white cap.  No preference raw or graded.  Email [url]vettejayk@aol.com[/url] if you have anything. Thanks very much.
